purpose: Provide a streamlined framework for developing and deploying AI agents with minimal overhead
principle: Built on a modular architecture using Svelte for front-end components and lightweight server-side processing
reusability: Highly modular with plug-and-play components, supports easy integration with existing AI models and APIs
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack extensive documentation and community support, limited to specific use cases
name: tinyflow
description: Tinyflow is a lightweight AI agent solution.
highlight: Lightweight and efficient AI agent framework optimized for rapid deployment and minimal resource usage
